3.「巨人族よ！ ボクの声が 聞こえるか？<yesno><close>: Giant people! Can you hear my voice?<yesno><close>

4.「おお！ 聞こえているか！| どうやら術は 成功したようだな！: Oh! You can hear me! Looks like the trick|worked!

5.「おどろかせて すまない。| 今のは ボクと 巨人族であるキミが| 言葉を交わせ: I'm sorry to scare you. That was just a trick|to get me and you, the giant, to talk to each|other.

6.「ボクの名は シグルド！| 世界の均衡を守るべく戦う ヴァルハラの戦士！: My name is Sigurd! I am a warrior of|Valhalla, fighting to protect the balance of|the world!

7.「キミの名は…… そうか <cs_pchero>か！| ボクの想像どおり 猛々し: Your name is Okay<cs_pchero>Oh, my God! It's just as fierce and beautiful|as I imagined it would be.

8.「勇猛な巨人族 <cs_pchero>よ！| キミは 気づいているか？| 我らの: A tribe of brave giants<cs_pchero>Hey! Have you noticed? The balance of our|world is beginning to shift.

9.「ボクは それを食い止めるために 長い旅を| していたが その途中で 先ほどの巨: I've been on a long journey to stop it, but|along the way, I've been captured by this|giant bird and trapped in this nest.

11.「まったく とんだ目にあったが| これも <cs_pchero>に 出会うための: It's been a hell of a ride| You know what?<cs_pchero>Maybe it was my destiny to meet...

12.「キミに 相談したいことがあるんだ。| すまないが 仲間の待つ ヴァルハラの館へ:
There's something I need to talk to you|about. I'm sorry, but I was wondering if you|could take me to Valhalla where my friends|
|are waiting.

13.「……なんだって？| キミは 人に頼まれて 巨鳥に奪われた指輪を| 取り返しにき: ... What is it? You've been sent by someone|to retrieve a ring that was stolen by a giant|bird.

14.「それなら 優先すべきは その使命だな。| まずは その指輪を 持ち主に届けよう: Then our priority is to use it... First, we|must get the ring to its rightful owner!

15.「勇猛な巨人族 <cs_pchero>よ！| ボクの足では 移動するのに 時間が: A tribe of brave giants<cs_pchero>No! It's gonna take me a while to get around|on my own. I'll just put it in your bag.

17.かばんの中から シグルドの声が聞こえる。: I heard Sigurd's voice in my bag...

18.「どうやら これで| キミの使命は 済んだようだな！: Looks like your mission is over!

19.「それでは すまないが ボクの仲間が待つ| ヴァルハラの館へ 向かってくれ！: Now, if you'll excuse me, I need you to make|your way to the halls of Valhalla, where my|friends await.

20.「じつは 幸運なことに ヴァルハラの館は| この 巨人族の町にあるんだ！: Fortunately, Valhalla's mansion is right here|in the city of the giants!

21.「あの階段を上がれば 巨人族の住まう| 特別 大きな家がある。そこに入って| 右:
If you go up those stairs, you'll come to a|special, large house inhabited by giants...|Go in there and to the right, to the room|
|with the peach-colored door!

22.「皆！ 遅くなって すまない！| ボクだ！ 今 帰ったぞ！！: Hey, guys! Sorry I'm late! It's me! I just|got home!

23.「おおっ シグルド様！！| よくぞ…… ご無事で お帰りになりました！: Oh, Master Sigurd! Well... You've returned|safely!

24.「おケガが ねえようで なによりです。| アッシらは 皆 シグルド様の お帰りを: I'm glad he's not hurt. We've all been|waiting for Sigurd's return for a long time.

25.「ところで その巨人族は……？: By the way, this Titan race...?

26.「あの者の 視線をあびても| 身体が動く！ ということは…………: I can move my body even when that thing is|staring at me! So that means...

27.「シグルド様！ ついに巨人族の戦士に| ふさわしき者を このヴァルハラの館へと|: Master Sigurd! At last you have brought a|worthy warrior of the giant race to the halls|of Valhalla!

28.「<pc>。我々 ヴァルハラの戦士は| 先ほどの術の かかっていない 巨人族の|: <pc> I'm sorry. We warriors of Valhalla can't move|our bodies when we're under the gaze of the|unarmed giants...

29.「これは 我々が 世の理に背いたゆえの制約。| ヴァルハラの戦士は もとは皆|: This is because we have disobeyed the laws of|the world. The warriors of Valhalla were all|warriors who lost their lives in battle...

31.「さあ！ キミを このヴァルハラの館へ| 招いた理由を話そう。: Come on! I invited you to Valhalla for a|reason.

32.<center>キミたち 巨人族は 知らないだろう。|世界は 調停者オーディンと: You giants do not know... The world is ruled|by a great being called Odin the Mediator.

33.<center>万物は 調停者オーディンにより|その形 その在り方を さだめられ:
All things were created by Odin, the|Mediator, to shape and shape and shape and|shape and shape and shape and shape and shape|
|and shape.

34.<center>その オーディンの かたわらには|我らの主であり 世界の均衡を保: I'm sure you'll be able to figure out what's|going on.

35.<center>しかし…… 調停者オーディンは|突如 天命の戦乙女を いずこかへ: But then... Suddenly, Odin the Mediator took|the Maiden of Heaven and destroyed the|balance of the world himself.

36.<center>オーディンは……|この世界を 闇に葬ろうとしているのだ。: Odin... Odin is about to bury this world in|darkness.

37.「……我々は ヴァルハラの戦士だ！| 必ずや 我らが主 天命の戦乙女を奪還し|: ... We are the warriors of Valhalla! We will|reclaim our master, the Maiden of Heaven, and|restore balance to the world!

39.「天命の戦乙女の 行方を探すためには| 三賢人と呼ばれる方々の おチカラを| 借: In order to find the whereabouts of the|Maiden of Heaven, we must rely on the help of|the so-called Three Wise Men...

40.「三賢人とは 英知の結晶……。世界の均衡を| より堅牢なものとする チカラを持つ:
The Three Wise Men are the crystallization of|wisdom... They have the power to make the|world's equilibrium more secure, but we have|
|yet to locate them.

42.「勇猛なる巨人族 <pc>よ！| このヴァルハラの館には 古来より| ある言い伝: A tribe of brave giants<pc> No! In the halls of Valhalla, there is a|legend that has been passed down for|centuries...

43.「世界の均衡が 崩れかけし時| 選ばれたる巨人族の戦士が 我らの道標となり| 世:
When the balance of the world is on the verge|of collapse, a chosen warrior of the Titan|race will be our beacon and save the world|
|from darkness. ....

44.「ボクは あの巨鳥と戦うキミを見て 確信した！| 巨人族の戦士に ふさわしき者は: I saw you fight that giant bird and I knew|for sure! There's no one better to be a Titan|warrior than you...

45.「<pc>！ 我ら ヴァルハラの戦士の| 道標になってくれ！ 盟友の契りを結び|:
You are a beacon! Be a beacon for us, the|warriors of Valhalla! Make us allies, become|warriors of the giant race, and fight with|
|us!

46.「しかし このままでは 世界は| 闇に 葬り去られてしまう！| 頼む……キミのチ: But if we don't, the world will be left in|darkness! Please... I need your help!

47.「ありがとう <pc>！| キミなら そう言ってくれると 信じていた！: Thank you<pc> I knew it! I knew you'd say that. I knew|you'd say that!

48.<if_woman>「皆 しかと見よ！| 彼女こそが 我らの道標となる| 巨人族: <if_woman>Behold her! She is our beacon, the warrior of|the giant race.<pc>   It is!<else>Behold him! He is the warrior of the giant|race who will be our guide.<pc> It is!<endif>

49.「心強き 盟友を得た今| 我らの勝利は 約束されたも同然だ！: Now that we have a strong ally, our victory|is as good as assured!

51.「フッ バカバカしい。| 付き合っていられませんね。: You idiot... I can't keep up with you...

52.「愚鈍な巨人族ごときが| 調停者オーディンを相手に| 何が できるというのです？: What could a simpleton of the Titan race|possibly do against Odin the Mediator?

55.「ハーゲンよ。キミの 戦士としての能力は| ボクも買っている……。しかし 盟友と: Har... I've seen what you can do as a|warrior. But you've become an ally.<pc> I will not allow you to taunt me!

56.「さあ 巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！| 粗末な品だが これを受け取ってくれ。| す: Come on, warrior of the giant race<pc> Hey! I know it's not much, but if you could|just take this... I thought it might help you|a little.

57.「我々は 全力を尽くして| 三賢人の居場所を 探しだしてみせる！: We will do everything in our power to locate|the Three Wise Men!

58.「何か わかったことがあれば しらせよう。| それまでは 休息を取っていてくれ！: I'll let you know if I learn anything... In|the meantime, I suggest you get some rest!

59.「巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！| 今 ボクたちは 全力を尽くして| 三賢人の居場所: Warrior of the Giant Race<pc> Hey! Right now, we're doing everything we can|to locate the Three Wise Men.

60.「何か わかったことがあれば しらせよう。| それまでは 休息を取っていてくれ！: I'll let you know if I learn anything... In|the meantime, I suggest you get some rest!
